DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to demonstrate the ability of DefinityÂ® enhanced versus unenhanced cardiac ultrasound to improve the accuracy and reproducibility of left ventricular ejection fraction (EF) when compared to magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).
DOC.brief_title: DMP115 in Patients With an Ejection Fraction Between 25%-40% to Evaluate the Use of Contrast Echocardiography to Assess Heart Function
DOC.criteria: Adult subjects 18 years of age or older Have a documented EF value ranging from 25% to 40% Have been scheduled to undergo or have undergone a cardiac MRI study Severe valvular dysfunction Inability to remain supine for 30 minutes
